repos_data.description: The Open Source kanban, built with Meteor. New English strings for new features at imports/i18n/data/en.i18n.json . Non-English translations at https://app.transifex.com/wekan/wekan only.
Sandstorm is a self-hostable web productivity suite. It's implemented as a security-hardened web app package manager. | Actively sponsored by our friends at LambdaTest
